transcript:
Customer: Hari Anant Hari Katha!
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir ha bolo sir.
Executive: Ha bol raha tha bol raha tha. Ji maine abhi. Jyotir mai kah raha hu na wo karwao aap to. Aisa kam to. Batao batao batao. Ek bar batao sir. Mai samajhna chahta hu dikkat aa kaha rahi hai.
Customer: Dikkat ye aa rahi hai ki jis tarah se aap dena chah rahe ho na us tarah se grahak lena nahi chahte maal.
Executive: Sir sir dekho ek baat samjho. Maan lo koi customer aaya aapke paas sir. Thik hai na? Ha.
Executive: Use aapne maan lijiye ek piece ke liye ya do piece ke liye baat hui aapki. To aage to aap use jyada ke liye convert kar sakte ho na. Apna customer bana sakte ho na. Aage baat nahi karega.
Executive: Sun sir?
Executive: Ek minute mai call karta hu aapko.
Customer: Ji ji ji karna mujhe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says buyers don't want goods.

- Customer says he cannot convert leads.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to explain lead conversion.

- Executive said he will call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer conversion, subscription
